title: Pizza Nachos
directions: There seems to be some cooking instructions missing!!!!!
I just made it and they were pretty good. A little salty and the cream sauce broke… But it still tasted good
Here is my take on the missing directions
Melt the butter in a sauce pan. Make a roux by adding the parmesan cheese to the melted butter and blend.
Add in the cream and milk stirring constantly till blended. Add in remaining sauce ingredients. Simmer on
Layer the chips in an oven proof cooking vessel, pour sauce over chips and layer remaining nacho ingredients.
Heat in a 350F oven till cheese is melted. Remove and enjoy.
Sounds like a good way to go about it.
Thanks Connie, sounds right !! I’m going to try this on Sunday . Let you know how it turns out .
Sounds like a good way to go about it.

Good thing I read Connie’s comment
ingredients: 3 cloves Garlic, Minced (or Use A Microplane If You Have It)
½ cups Garlic Cream Sauce (Recipe Included)
½ cups Pepperoni, Cut Into Bite Size Pieces
½ whole Green Bell Pepper, Seeds Removed, Diced
